sentences: Jason Suecof (born April 3, 1980) is an American musician, sound engineer, songwriter, and record producer best known for his work with artists such as  Trivium, Battlecross, Death Angel, All That Remains, Bury Your Dead, The Black Dahlia Murder, and The Autumn Offering.

He has produced and/or mixed bands such as Austrian Death Machine, Death Angel, Battlecross, Chelsea Grin, All That Remains, Motionless in White,  Bury Your Dead, August Burns Red, The Black Dahlia Murder, Dååth, The Autumn Offering, Luna Mortis, Chimaira, DevilDriver, God Forbid, If Hope Dies, Trivium, Job for a Cowboy, Whitechapel, Mutiny Within, Dir En Grey, Sanctity.
In 2010, he joined up with Howard Stern Show writer Richard Christy's (Ex-Iced Earth) new project, Charred Walls of the Damned as their guitarist.
